xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/674129-Classic Albums: Tears for Fears - Songs From the Big Chair 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/mVgbvCwQsHIEkdrn3xfZL3Vea6q.jpg A documentary that explores the creation of the seminal, second album by Tears for Fears. Songs from the Big Chair took the gothic synth-pop foundations of the band and combined them with arena-ready anthems, leading to critical acclaim and three international hit singles, Mothers Talk, Shout and Everybody Wants to Rule the World. Classic Albums: Tears for Fears - Songs From the Big Chair
